original_title: Panic! At The Disco: ...Live In Chicago
overview: Departing from their previous sound and ushering in a new era of folk-influenced melodies, Panic! at the Disco presents a concert film documenting their performances in Chicago, Illinois during the tour for their sophomore album 'Pretty. Odd.' in 2008.
tagline: Things are shaping up to be pretty odd.
title: Panic! At The Disco: ...Live In Chicago
